name: High School Blues
description:
Himari hasn't always been bright since her parent's divorce has put a hole in her story. She lives with her overly dramatic mother, while her dad is doing things that she doesn't know. 

Himari is forced to move to a new school since living in the city before has broke the budget of living expenses. During her stay though, she has meet an overly bright and arrogant girl Chiyo. 

Months has passed since then, and it's time for a new annual cultural festival being hosted by the school.  Her teacher's comment in class has made her flustered and confused by teenage life and and she asks her friend what loving someone is all about. 

Go on a journey to experience more of Himari's story and the very different characters she comes across on her journey.

I hope you enjoy what this visual novel has to offer and comment any bugs/glitches you may come across.

Huge Credit to onboroo for such amazing sprites used in my visual novel!

At the moment, this game is only playable on a Mac device, as I use a Mac.
